item.description:
Since I have become organizer, I've noticed a lot of new people have joined. I was thinking that Feb. is too far away! I want to meet everyone sooner than that. I know this is short notice, but it'd be great if you could make it. I also scheduled it on a Sunday for Blakely!

If it is too cold outside for our little ones to play, maybe a volunteer can let us gather in their home? My apartment is far too small...

We all know how difficult it is in the winter for our tiny friends.
item.name: Short-Notice January Meetup Group
